front.title: IGMP/MLD-Based Explicit Membership Tracking Function for Multicast Routers

abstract.t: This document describes the IGMP/MLD-based explicit membership tracking function for multicast routers supporting IGMPv3/MLDv2. The explicit membership tracking function contributes to saving network resources and shortening leave latency, and enables operators to see which downstream routers(s) on a LAN are joined to which multicast tree.
